attributes.action: Recognise Palestine as a State and seek immediate ceasefire in Gaza
attributes.background:
We call on the UK government to recall parliament and act now

We believe it is imperative the UK Government acknowledges the rights of all Palestinian people and seeks to implement an immediate ceasefire in Gaza. Their suffering must end; they dese

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727717
